attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please make Brucie a Sir for his contribution to entertaining the people both past and present. Brucie is a ray of sunshine, particularly in these gloomy times. Its always nice to see him, to see him nice!!!!!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
